title: The Beginning
content:
### _11110100110100000001000_

Hello there. ðŸ’«

I started this website back in the summer this year. A little bit has changed since then. I was previously pursuing a bachelor's in "Cybersecurity and Information Assurance" because the software world freaked me out.

Well.. Mostly just the job security thing. Or ability to *get* a job in the first place.

Anyway, I realized this is my actual passion and I don't give a shit about that because I'll get to do something I love so I have switched focus back to software. I have also realized that Cyber is a useful niche as long as that's all you want to do. I am passionate about security but, I don't want to be a help desk-er or sys admin for years until I get to work as an analyst.

*Riveting.*

I have been reading K&R 2 C as it's colloquially known. It's amazing. I love C so much.

Perhaps I'll be an embedded systems engineer or something one day.

But yeah not much exciting yet, but eager for the future.

> It does not matter how slowly you go,

> as long as you don't give up. - Confucius

```sh
#include <stdio.h>

int main() {
Â  Â  printf("made with love");
}
```
